text: Alexandru Cătălin Neagu (born 26 January 1993) is a Romanian professional footballer who currently plays as a midfielder for Ripensia Timișoara. Neagu started playing professional football for FC Argeș Pitești; from there he was transferred to Real Murcia, in Segunda División. Neagu started his career in Liga I (Romania) playing two years for Pandurii Târgu Jiu, where he was loaned to different teams before finally joining CFR Cluj in 27 July 2016. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Pitești Category:Romanian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:FC Argeș Pitești players Category:Real Murcia players Category:Liga I players Category:Liga II players Category:CS Pandurii Târgu Jiu players Category:FC UTA Arad players Category:SCM Râmnicu Vâlcea players Category:FC Academica Clinceni players Category:CFR Cluj players Category:ASA 2013 Târgu Mureș players Category:CS Mioveni players Category:FC Metaloglobus București players Category:FC Ripensia Timișoara players Category:Romanian expatriate footballers Category:Romanian expatriate sportspeople in Spain Category:Expatriate footballers in Spain
title: Alexandru Cătălin Neagu
